title: ALS-associated VRK1 R321C mutation causes proteostatic imbalance and mitochondrial defects in iPSC-derived motor neurons
details: D Oliveira, AF Assoni, LM Alves, A Sakugawa, US Melo… - Neurobiology of Disease, 2024
abstract: Abstract Vaccinia-related kinase 1 (VRK1) is a gene which has been implicated in the pathological process of a broad range of neurodevelopmental disorders as well as neuropathies, such as Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS). Here we report a …
